alston.minecraft

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • alston.minecraft.Game
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class Game
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Contains all game variables and handles initialization of a few of the Objects. There should only be one instance of this running at all times, but there can be multiple games held in Main.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game()
        Constructor for Game. Instantiates a new World, sets the player's location based on the world, and initiates values for all variables.

    • Method Detail

      • getChunk

        public Chunk getChunk(int x,
             int y)
        Gets the Chunk with the specified coordinates by creating a new MapKey with the parameters, and using it as a Key in the HashMap to get the Chunk.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the Chunk
        y - The y coordinate of the Chunk
        Returns:
        The Chunk obtained from the HashMap with the specified coordinates, or null if it does not exist

      • add

        public void add(Chunk chunk,
       int x,
       int y)
        Maps the given Chunk to the specified coordinates by creating a new MapKey with the parameters and using it as a Key to put the Chunk in the HashMap. Note that there should only be one Chunk that corrosponds to any single Key (and therefore 1 Chunk for each x and y coordinates combination).
        Parameters:
        chunk - The Chunk to be mapped
        x - The x coordinate of the Chunk
        y - The y coodinate of the Chunk

      • getCurrentChunkX

        public int getCurrentChunkX()
        Returns:
        X coordinate of the Chunk the player is on

      • getCurrentChunkY

        public int getCurrentChunkY()
        Returns:
        Y coordinate of the Chunk the player is on

      • getLoadedChunks

        public java.util.LinkedList getLoadedChunks()
        Gets all the currently loaded Chunks.
        Returns:
        A List containing all the existing Chunks.

      • getDroppedItems

        public java.util.ArrayList getDroppedItems()
        Returns:
        The ArrayList containing all Items dropped

      • getPlayer

        public Player getPlayer()
        Returns:
        The Player that represents the user

      • getInventoryBar

        public InventoryBar getInventoryBar()
        Returns:
        The InventoryBar containing all the Bar Pictures

      • setCurrentChunkX

        public void setCurrentChunkX(int currentChunkX)
        Parameters:
        currentChunkX - The new X coordinate of the Chunk the player is on

      • setCurrentChunkY

        public void setCurrentChunkY(int currentChunkY)
        Parameters:
        currentChunkY - The new Y coordinate of the Chunk the player is on

      • getMobs

        public java.util.concurrent.CopyOnWriteArrayList<Mob> getMobs()
        Returns:
        A List containing all the existing Mobs

      • getTime

        public int getTime()
        Returns:
        The current game time between 0 and 23, with 0 as midnight and 12 as noon.

      • setTime

        public void setTime(int time)
        Parameters:
        time - A integer between 0 and 23 that represents the game time, with 0 as midnight, 6 as sunrise, 12 as noon and 18 as sunset

      • checkOnChangingLights

        public void checkOnChangingLights()
        Checks to see if there is a thread to change the lighting currently running and updates it if it is.
